alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Leon County through 515 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tallahassee Comm College, or near Tallahassee. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Macon Community Park, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Eight Mile Pond, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, Tallahassee Regional A/P, State Capital Complex, Forest Meadows Park, Springsax Park, Levy Park, Andrew and Maclay State Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
